summary: Fixed 2 critical bugs: 1) Added null-safe operators in BeautySubscriptionController for vendor properties (defensive coding after validation check) and in helpers.php payment success hook for salon/store relationships to prevent null access errors, 2) Fixed unsafe array access in BeautyBookingService by checking if config("module.current_module_data") is an array before accessing ["id"] key to prevent TypeError when config returns null.
current_status: All null-safety issues fixed. Code now safely handles potential null values in relationships and config access.
